about:
“Learning everyday keeps you young and motivated”, I brainstorm everyday and try to utilize my time productively.I understand how technological products are developed, which were hugly used by individuals. 

 Meditation and affirmations are my daily starters. 

 I love to read, understand and teach. I am highly interested in building teams and working collaboratively. Designing scalable systems and solving problems kicks dopamine in me. I am an avid reader.
